content:
Should clicking on the color bar on the stream recipient button in the compose box open the menu or not? Right now clicking the color bar right does nothing.

Is that a behavior that we want?

Good question. I think the question is whether it feels intuitively to users like it's probably part of the button. If it does, probably from an HTML and click handlers perspective, it should be part of the button too, not a decoration to the side of it.

That said I think it's likely pretty low importance whichever way we do it, in that I think nobody is in practice going to hover their mouse over it.

To me it definitely feels like part of the button/dropdown.

It's a swatch showing your color for the stream, so it's another form of the same information that the stream name is providing further to the right. And it's part of the same rounded rectangle with the rest of the dropdown.
The current plan with the compose box redesign is to remove that color bar altogether (#24878). So it would probably be more helpful to test getting rid of it, rather than adjusting what's clickable.
